author: Michael Cruz
comment: I liked the concept but this app crashes every time I try to share from my Moto X to my 360.  Update- reinstalled, doesn't crash anymore, but nothing appears on my watch.     Update 2- figured out some of the nuances of the app. Can't share from textra because that's where the app was crashing. It works when sharing from the gallery.  Also you have to share twice to get it on the watch, once from the app, then again from the notation drawer. Not exactly seamless, but it works. Upgrading my review to 3 stars

reply.author: Jonas Bark
reply.content: Could you please upload your crash data after the crash happens? I'll look into fixing it, then.

title: Some glitches but it works.

author: Max Sergeyenko
comment: 1) pictures that are portrait are rotated... why???... fix it.  2) pictures are not zoomable.. idk if that is possible it it is pleaseeeeee add that! 3)Make the notifications appear ONLy on the watch without showing up on the phone Otherwise very useful!
title: Awesome idea but a couple of problems please fix them :)

comment: I Like this app, but not everything is shared on my Gear Live.  Text goes through and sometimes pictures.  Sending web address appears on watch just like a text. I don't have web on my watch so I don't know if that changes anything. If I send address back to phone, nothing happens.

reply.author: Jonas Bark
reply.content: Only the text of the Web page will be shown, this is intended and can't be improved to show the real page unfortunately.

title: Potential

author: Dylan Sansovich
comment: I use this everyday, simply type a short list into phone and send it over to your watch and it's there till you swipe it away. It's very useful I love it
title: Awesome App

author: Feroz Shahid
comment: It is very useful app, would be cool if it had tasker integration to allow you to send a notification of text from a plugin in taker, you should look in to that :)
title: Great app

author: Amy Christian
comment: Love this concept, unfortunately the website share feature is not working.

author: James Kerr
comment: Used this to have a an easy to read recipe on my wrist whilst cooking. Just shared the web page and it works great. I'm sure many more developments are in the works. Very responsive and helpful developer.
title: Great way to get stuff on your watch

author: CHARLES MCQUAID
comment: fantastic - and I didn't have to stay up all night trying to make it work.
title: Oh WOW

author: Steve Haigh
comment: Does exactly what it claims, perfectly.
title: Works great

author: dennis wojcik
comment: Works great . Just what I wanted. Thanks

author: sportsquid
comment: When sending text, it just shows up on a card with a gray background. It would be nice to choose a color for the background. Also the pictures always get cut off when sent to my wear device.

reply.author: Jonas Bark
reply.content: Thanks for the Feedback, I'll push an update soon to fix the pictures.

title: Useful but needs work

author: Sonic Revolution BETA
comment: I was going to use this app as a Notebook addition but when I sent it to my Moto 360 the message that popped up was "Disconnected From Phone" with the Bluetooth symbol and a slanted line over it. So I tried to resync my phone with my watch and realized that this app disaster is the reason that my phone and my Moto 360 shall never connect again. Extreme pity!
title: YOU F****D UP MY MOTO 360! Why can't I go to 0 stars!
